attributes.action: ensure that Jon and Tracy Morter are recognised in the New Year Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the success of the recent campaign to get Rage Against the Machine to the Christmas Number One Spot I would like to see the founders of the facebook group, Jon and Tracy Morter, recognised firstly for services to music and secondly but perhaps more importantly services to the homeless in raising over £70,000 for Shelter in such a short time. They truly deserve our recognition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
